long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Privacy Focussed AI

Do you want to access AI without sharing your details and maintaining your privacy and not being tracked? 
You can use Chatgpt, meta.ai without creating an account, but once you refresh your page, the answers are gone. 
Laddu AI helps in bridging that gap. We are privacy focussed. We do not save your details. We do not even ask for your email id or any details. Just download our extension and start asking questions.
All your chats stay local in your browser. Its not hosted on any service. We do not save your chats or access them.
After installing, Laddu AI is available to be used in all the tabs. A small icon will be present on the side and click on it to open the chat interface.
We also provide a small context menu for the most common uses. Just select a text and laddu-icon appears and click on it to access menus.

Turn your browser into an AI Browser with Laddu AI, a privacy focussed browser extension, that lets you access AI in every browser tab.
